'''''Beyond Bree'' May 1981''' was the third issue of the [[Beyond Bree]] journal published by the [[Tolkien Special Interest Group of American Mensa]].

==Contents==
* Review of Excalibur
* Analysis of "Sir Celegwen" by N. Martsch
* List of fantasy bookstores
